definition: plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
PRC State Development and Planning Committee, set up 1998 to replace State Planning Committee 國家計劃委員會|国家计划委员会, replaced in 2003 by National Development and Reform Commission 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
ren2 lei4 ji1 yin1 zu3 ji4 hua4

definition: PRC State Planning Committee, set up in 1952, replaced in 1998 by State Development and Planning Committee 國家發展計劃委員會|国家发展计划委员会[Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4] then in 2003 by National Development and Reform Commission 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会[Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 he2 Gai3 ge2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
Lian2 he2 guo2 Kai1 fa1 Ji4 hua4 shu3

sentences.english: How long would it take to assemble a team for a project like this?
sentences.chinese: 爲這樣一個計劃調集一個小組的人需要多長時間？

sentences.english: Sit down and plan out a strategy for defeating your doubt.
sentences.chinese: 坐下來然後制定一項擊敗懷疑的計劃。

sentences.english: Russia, a major oil producer, is unlikely to embrace any ambitious emissions reductions.
sentences.chinese: 產油大國俄羅斯不太可能歡迎任何大幅減排計劃。

sentences.english: B. Replan the project without the resources.
sentences.chinese: 跑去資源重新計劃該項目。

sentences.english: The verification and measurement plan of checking fixture dimension should be confirmed by YFV engineer.
sentences.chinese: 檢具的尺寸驗證測量計劃需得到延鋒工程師的確認。

sentences.english: Will insulin analogs improve my diabetes treatment plan?
sentences.chinese: 胰島素類似物會改善我的糖尿病治療計劃嗎？

sentences.english: Applicants should not be receiving any other bursary schemes.
sentences.chinese: 申請者不應是其他助學金計劃的領受者。

sentences.english: MKCCC and Good Shepherd Community Church agreed to co-operate on building project.
sentences.chinese: 美堅堂與善牧堂正式簽署建堂合作計劃。

sentences.english: Prepay and Post Pay option for each dial plan.
sentences.chinese: 預付款和後付款選項爲每個撥號計劃。

sentences.english: What publications will be published during the Guangzhou Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 廣州亞運會賽時官方出版物計劃有哪些？

sentences.english: Make a self-development plan to acquire the skills and experiences you need.
sentences.chinese: 制定一個獲取技能和經驗的自我提升計劃。

sentences.english: He was very open about his inspiration and his plans for his career.
sentences.chinese: 對於他的夢想和職業生涯計劃，韓庚是很公開的。

sentences.english: Julian came up with another of his hare-brained schemes for raising money.
sentences.chinese: 朱利安又提出了一個愚蠢的籌款計劃。

sentences.english: Are the program effects attainted at a reasonable cost?
sentences.chinese: 爲取得計劃效果所花費的成本是否合理？

sentences.english: Of the original scheme hardly a wrack remains.
sentences.chinese: 原來的計劃幾乎一點殘跡也未留下。

sentences.english: The intelligence service conceived a grand design to assassinate the War Minister.
sentences.chinese: 情報機構策劃了一項暗殺陸軍部長的重大計劃。

definition: variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
